Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value for us, but we believe it could be an exceptional addition to your collection or business, potentially unlocking new opportunities and enhancing its overall performance. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that could be worth significantly more in the future. We are confident that once you experience its quality and capabilities, you will see the true value it can bring. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
